page.title: 15FARMING-ATCHLEY MANOR FARM
page.content: Atchley Manor Farm is used solely for cattle rearing unlike Upper Atchley which sells some of its surplus cereals.It is combined qith Cosford Grange Farm which concentrates on pig rearing to provide a total of 420 acres.The combined farms produce much of the feed they require,growing 150acres of Barley,55acres of potatoes and 61 acres of sugar beet and buying in the rest. The farm rears Aberdeen Angus cross for beef production.The animals are kept indoors as much as possible.They use 5 Aberdeen Angus bulls from Canada crossed with avariety of other breeds. The farm is heavily mechanised using 14 tractors,5 combine harvesters and 3 balers.They often do contract work for neighbours.The cattle are fed on crush -ed or rolled barley or wheat which looks like ReadyBrek they do themselve
